title: Out of the total area under reservation, 40% of the area shall be earmarked for reservation and rest shall be put to slum rehabilitation in schemes where the existing tenement density of slums is less than 450 T/Ha
clause_text: Out of the total area under reservation, 40% of the area shall be earmarked for reservation and rest shall be put to slum rehabilitation in schemes where the existing tenement density of slums is less than 450 T/Ha. The area earmarked for reservation may be reduced to 33 %, where existing tenement density is more than 450 T/Ha. Remaining land under reservation shall be handed over to the concerned Planning / Appropriate Authority as per provision in UDCPR. Provision of Accommodation Reservation shall not be applicable.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
